about_the_game:
Typhoon Unit ~ Butterfly Requiem is a bullet hell shooting adventure where you swap between a trio of heroes on the fly!

Take control of Gale, Fia, and Casey, three flying fighters with their own unique abilities! Through strategic character swaps, and the power of Synergy Boost, you can overwhelm your foes with tactics and style!


In a land where fantasy and technology intertwine, cities across the world are under attack. The only thing connecting these incidents is the Steel Butterfly, a sword wielding butterfly woman who brings destruction in her wake.

The Typhoon Unit, a small but capable band of airborne heroes, have been called in to put a stop to the threat. Can the Typhoon Unit halt the Steel Butterfly's conquest, and discover her secrets?



  • Heart pounding bullet hell action!
  • Blast, dodge, and punch as a team of three unique heroes!
  • Switch on the fly, and use the power of teamwork to make your heroes even stronger!
  • Battle a blade wielding butterfly, a rock star siren, a gadget powered puppeteer and more in challenging boss encounters!
  • Experience a world of magic technology and cute monster girls!
  • Pursue the mysterious Steel Butterfly, in a Story Mode spanning 7 chapters!
  • Test your skills, and go for the highest possible score in Arcade Mode!
